detail_desc: Long, sleeveless dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a round neck and yoke at the top. Opening and a covered button at the back of the neck, visible, decorative seams front and back and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Elasticated faux fur scrunchies without metal clips.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, one outer compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate. Lined. Size approx. 12x28x44 cm.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Set with a blouse, pair of leggings and a hairband. Blouse in a cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
Glasses with no lenses and glittery plastic frames.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.

Shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Witch’s hat in satin-covered felt with a shimmering pattern. Hair extensions at the back.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled plumeti cotton weave with a V-neck and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and a flared skirt with inset lace trims. Lined with a short dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Spotted tights with an elasticated waist.

Two-piece dance costume with a glossy jersey body and a chiffon skirt. Body with a V-neck, gathers at the top, short sleeves and a lined gusset. Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and narrow elastication at the hems.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Small bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Size 5x12.5x19 cm.
Coat in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a concealed drawstring at the waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and classic front. Narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Ballet pumps with a strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Height of soles 0.3 cm.
Bell-shaped, pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and laser-cut hem. Lined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Blouse in a sturdy viscose weave with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gentle flare to the hem.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
V-neck jumper in an airy, fine-knit cashmere blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a ribbed hem.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam under the bust and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Twill trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication and a button at the waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed jersey. Length 35 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. One patterned pair.
Sweatpants in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Slightly lower crotch, and straight legs that taper to the hem.
Cardigan in a soft bouclé knit with terry appliqués on the chest, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Pyjamas in soft fleece. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and jersey ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and jersey ribbing at the hems.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Flared, knee-length skirt in cotton satin. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, a detachable, braided belt and a large flap patch pocket on each side. Unlined.

Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves that finish at the elbows. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and an A-line skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Plastic glasses chain. Length 80 cm.
Tube scarf in soft, garter-stitched cotton with ribbed trims at the ends and a small imitation leather appliqué.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with ribbed panels. Inset jersey panels in the sides and zipped front pockets. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top, and a flounce around the neckline.
Short, fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a gently draped collar, V-neck and wrapover front. Long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Leather sandals with leather insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Block-coloured sports swimsuit with a zip at the top, small collar and long raglan sleeves. Lined at the front and gusset.

Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Lace frills down the front that continue over the shoulders, and long sleeves with lace trims at the cuffs.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
Top in striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Diameter 2 cm.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Push-up bra in microfibre and patterned mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back.
Coat in a soft bouclé wool blend with a gently rounded shape that tapers to the hem, buttons down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, wide shoulder straps and lacing at the back.
Jersey T-shirt with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Large, double-layered collar in a cotton weave that has a frill trim and is divided at the back.

Joggers in washed, stretch denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim legs with gathered seams and a visible zip at the hems.
Metal chain necklace with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Cardigan in a soft knit containing alpaca and mohair. V-neck, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
